full_output.summary: I am Arun Ahirwar, a third-year B.Tech student branch in Computer Science at Ajay Kumar Engineering College, Ghaziabad. With a solid foundation in web development and a passion for creating interactive and user-friendly web applications, I specialize in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and React. My hands-on experience includes developing an e-commerce platform, Smart Farmer, and a social messaging platform, Quick Connect. I am dedicated to continuously learning and improving my skills, as evidenced by my certications in web development and digital marketing. I am eager to apply my knowledge and enthusiasm to a frontend developer internship, where I can contribute to impactful projects and further hone my technical abilities.

projects.name: Smart Farmer
projects.description: Provide next-generation software solutions for product companies to store and maintain product information.

projects.name: Quick Connect
projects.description: Created a social platform that supports voice and video calls, text messaging, media sharing, and community interaction.

full_output.name: ARUN AHIRWAR
